show.title: PCO - A Wish Machine
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/LP84N9
show.description: When a young husband discovers a mysterious phone booth that grants wishes, he must carefully navigate its power to help his family while dealing with the unexpected consequences of each wish, all while trying to save his once-verbal wife who has mysteriously lost her ability to speak.
show.description_secondary: When a young husband discovers a mysterious phone booth that grants wishes, he must carefully navigate its power to help his family while dealing with the unexpected consequences of each wish, all while trying to save his once-verbal wife who has mysteriously lost her ability to speak.
